Format:Number

Display:

?0xH000055=12?Watching the demo
?0xH000e91=0?On the Overworld  @Weapon(0xH001031)  Level @Number(0xH001010)  knows @Number(0xK001038_0xK001039) @SpellsCase(0xK001038_0xK001039)
@Map(0xH000e88)  @Weapon(0xH001031)  Level @Number(0xH1010)  knows @Number(0xK001038_0xK001039) @SpellsCase(0xK001038_0xK001039)
